author: Edgar Vázquez
text: Really thinking if this will be my first and last time buying from StockX, really disappointing on how long I been having to wait for my order I guess just happy they find alternatives when something goes wrong but not happy with the amount of time I been having to wait and still need to wait to receive a order I placed 3 weeks ago plus another week till I get my order.
title: First and last time buying from StockX ?

author: Melissa
text: For my first time ordering on this website to stay Im disappointed is an understatement if I could give 0 stars I would how is it possible to buy a supposedly authentic pair of Jordan 3s and receive 2 different shoes all together? Is the process just leave the shoes in the box and not compare both shoes. Since this was my first time I was unaware of the tag process and now am stuck with a extremely fake pair of Jordans.
title: For my first time ordering on this website

author: Justin
text: It's been well over a week and I have not received the product who actually get 0 stars.
title: It's been well over a week and I have…

author: Ryan
text: The pictures and description of these shoes did not at all accurately show the color/finish of the shoes purchased. They looked matt black in the photos and are a shiny reflective material in reality. Not happy with picture/description. Rest of the transaction was good and smooth. Quick shipping etc. Unfortunately I have a pair of shoes I will never wear and cannot return etc. Even if I resell on StockX the selling fees etc will make this a $100 + mistake.
title: The pictures and description of these…

author: Melvin
text: I ordered a shirt 3-4 weeks ago, & still haven’t received it yet! All it says is “ awaiting packaging “ & it was for my birthday & my birthday is in 3 days!
title: I haven’t received my order yet!
